description: This file contains C source code functions for managing DNS relay forwarding configurations in a networking system. It includes functions to get and set DNS relay settings using a Utopia context, handling configuration parameters like enable status, DNS server IP, and network interface.

methods.name: int Utopia_Get_DeviceDnsRelayForwarding(UtopiaContext * pCtx,int index,void * str_handle)
methods.description: Retrieves DNS relay forwarding settings from the Utopia database for a given index and populates the provided Obj_Device_DNS_Relay structure.

methods.name: int Utopia_Set_DeviceDnsRelayForwarding(UtopiaContext * pCtx,int index,void * str_handle)
methods.description: Sets DNS relay forwarding parameters in the Utopia database from the provided Obj_Device_DNS_Relay structure for a specified index.
